title: Machine Learning Design Strategies for Vibration Control of Cement-Based Metamaterials

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental vibration theory, foundational materials science, and understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Parallel laboratory-based practical training and theoretical lectures, with design simulations using digital tools

learning_goals: They can explain the structural properties and vibration control mechanisms of cement-based metamaterials.
They can predict and optimize the vibration-blocking performance of metamaterials using machine learning models (MLP/GA).
They can evaluate the correlation between performance metrics and variables in metamaterial design by analyzing actual experimental data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
